alert.note: Alert for Piscataquis (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 12 at 6:20PM EDT until July 12 at 7:00PM EDT by NWS Caribou
info.description: The National Weather Service in Caribou Maine has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Piscataquis County in north central Maine... * Until 700 PM EDT. * At 619 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 6 miles southeast of Lobster Lake to near Greenville, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Greenville, Ripogenus, Kokadjo, White Cap Mountain, Frenchtown, Lobster Township, Northeast Carry, Baxter State Park, Beaver Cove, Spencer Bay and Lily Bay. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A severe thunderstorm has some potential for producing a tornado although forecaster confidence is not high enough to issue a tornado warning. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
